Name: GHOST HUNTER
About the game: GHOST HUNTER - is the simplest 3D shooter with horror elements where you will have to fight with different ghosts! You are a brave ghost hunter who is sent to do the task in an enormous ancient castle full of different creatures. You must kill all of them. There are 3 big levels with keys that can open the right door. To find the key you will have to search every corner of the castle. You have to solve an uneasy problem because there will be various creatures that are anxious of your death. You have 3 kinds of weapon - a sword, a crossbow, an automatic weapon which can shoot with pikes. Collect ammos, explore the locations, kill ghosts, look for keys. You will definitely enjoy the game! KEY FEATURES: - The simplest gameplay. - Pixel graphics. - Large and various locations. - Incredible atmosphere. - Cool impressions from the game.
